bug.author: XWalways
bug.description:
While using ENAS_Scheduler Maybeï¼š <denchmark-code>tbar.set_description('avg reward: {}'.format(self.baseline)) </denchmark-code>
is better than <denchmark-code>tbar.set_description('avg reward: {:.2f}'.format(self.baseline)) </denchmark-code>
